alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:17PM CDT until July 29 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 516 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cowarts, or 8 miles north of Cottonwood, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dothan, Ashford, Cowarts, Avon, Memphis, Keytons, Enon, Lovetown, Wilson Mill and Ardilla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
